lexUnit.name: risk.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: a situation which puts a person in danger

sentence.text: But even were Mr Li to harbour such intentions , he would run the risk of seeing Mr Zhu come out shining .
